subject: Order #SSN1653
description_text:
Hello Dear Support Team,

I ordered pedals on June 5, 2025. Unfortunately, the package is stuck in a UPS warehouse. UPS is not providing any support or further information and is referring me to the retailer.

Can you assist me? Do you have any additional information about the package and its delivery?

Thank you in advance.

Best regards
Nino Achsel

Gesendet von Outlook für Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: 你好，Nino Achsel，  好的，我们明天会联系 UPS 检查情况并给您提供解决方案。

Hi Nino Achsel,    We contacted UPS, they fed back that your package was checked at customs and may need some information, they will contact UPS in Germany to send an email for you, please pay attention to check, this is their email: importde@ups.com

Hey,

thank you for your help!

Best regards
Nino

Gesendet von Outlook für Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
Hi Nino Achsel,    Have you received information from UPS and assisted them with relevant clearance information yet.

Hello,

UPS delivered the package as of today. Thank you for your Support!

Best regards
Nino

Gesendet von Outlook für Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
Hi Nino Achsel,    Glad to hear the good news, have fun!
